author: djrtwo
content:
Tim is on vacation, I made the call. This was not a "we need to patch an edge case that someone might hit in some weird sync race condition", this was a critical failure in a public release that said "merge ready". 

I decided that going to sleep last night in hopes of a release this morning was less damage than pushing it out last night with "TBD" or otherwise. I would have considered the same for other situations and other clients. depending on the severity, the information around the bug at the time, and expected timelines.

I did fail to engage with that decision here either by notifying or asking the general sentiment, and in retrospect I should have done a minimum of the former
